item.text: Functional abilities and goals - admission [CMS Assessment]
Mobility - discharge goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Roll left and right - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Supervision or touching assistance - Helper provides verbal cues or touching/steadying assistance as patient completes activity. Assistance may be provided throughout the activity or intermittently.

item.text: Sit to lying - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Setup or clean-up assistance - Helper sets up or cleans up; patient completes activity. Helper assists only prior to or following the activity.

item.text: Lying to sitting on side of bed - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Setup or clean-up assistance - Helper sets up or cleans up; patient completes activity. Helper assists only prior to or following the activity.

item.text: Sit to stand - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Supervision or touching assistance - Helper provides verbal cues or touching/steadying assistance as patient completes activity. Assistance may be provided throughout the activity or intermittently.

item.text: Bed-to-chair transfer - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Toilet transfer - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Car transfer - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Walk 10 feet - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Walk 50 feet with two turns - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Walk 150 feet - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Walking 10 feet on uneven surfaces - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: 1 step (curb) - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports truck or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: 4 steps - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: 12 steps - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Picking up object - functional goal during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Dependent - Helper does all of the effort. Patient does none of the effort to complete the activity. Or, the assistance of 2 or more helpers is required for the patient to complete the activity.
